#summary wxLua 2.8.10.0 builds

= Introduction =

My goal is to build wxLua with normal utf8 display. The official build is perfect for linux, but fails on windows.


= Details =

Available wxLua builds for windows:

 *  (1) [http://downloads.sourceforge.net/wxlua/wxLua-2.8.10.0-MSW-bin.zip Latest official build]
 *  (2) [http://baghead.drdteam.org/apps/doomcrap-0.1.4.zip?nocache1 Bagheadspidey's build ]
 *  (3) My wxLua 2.8.10.0 80MB mingw-unicode-debug build 
 *  (4) [http://switch.dl.sourceforge.net/project/wxlua/wxlua/2.8.7.0/wxLua-2.8.7.0-MSW-bin.zip wxLua-2.8.7.0-MSW-bin], b174fa10414380dade17692f21f381df



||    || label || xrc || txtctrl input ||
||(1) ||   a   ||  a  ||       a       ||
||(2) ||   u   ||  a  ||       a       ||
||(3) ||   a   ||  u  ||       a       ||

where a:ascii and u:utf8 means the displayed utf8 text format
----
mingw32-make -f makefile.gcc WXWIN=D:\wxWidgets UNICODE=1 DEBUG=1
